languages.text: {n}Женщина упрямо глядит вам прямо в глаза — долго, очень долго, словно на дне ваших зрачков есть ответы на все вопросы.{/n}
{n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина упрямо глядит вам прямо в глаза — долго, очень долго, словно на дне ваших зрачков есть ответы на все вопросы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman obstinately stares you in the eye for a long, long time, as if the bottom of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}
{n}The woman obstinately stares you in the eye for a long, long time, as if the bottom of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}
{n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}

{n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}
{n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mujer te mira a los ojos con obstinación durante un largo, largo rato, como si pudiera encontrar las respuestas a todas sus dudas y preguntas en el fondo de tus pupilas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer te mira a los ojos con obstinación durante un largo, largo rato, como si pudiera encontrar las respuestas a todas sus dudas y preguntas en el fondo de tus pupilas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}耶格尔固执地盯着你的双眼，盯了很久很久，仿佛你的瞳孔后面藏着答案，可以解答她此刻所有的问题与疑惑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}耶格尔固执地盯着你的双眼，盯了很久很久，仿佛你的瞳孔后面藏着答案，可以解答她此刻所有的问题与疑惑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}イェーガーは、まるであなたの瞳孔のうしろに彼女のすべての疑問と疑いに対する答えがあるかのように長く、かたくなにあなたの目をじっと見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イェーガーは、まるであなたの瞳孔のうしろに彼女のすべての疑問と疑いに対する答えがあるかのように長く、かたくなにあなたの目をじっと見る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La femme plante son regard dans le vôtre et vous observe longuement, très longuement, comme si les réponses à ses doutes et questions se trouvaient quelque part au fond de vos pupilles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme plante son regard dans le vôtre et vous observe longuement, très longuement, comme si les réponses à ses doutes et questions se trouvaient quelque part au fond de vos pupilles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kadın, sanki göz bebeklerinin ardında tüm sorularının ve şüphelerinin cevapları saklıymış gibi uzun bir süre inatla gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadın, sanki göz bebeklerinin ardında tüm sorularının ve şüphelerinin cevapları saklıymış gibi uzun bir süre inatla gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Frau blickt dir lange in die Augen, als stünden auf der Rückseite deiner Pupillen die Antworten auf all ihre Fragen und Zweifel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman stares you obstinately in the eye for a long, long time, as if the backs of your pupils held the answers to all of her questions and doubts.{/n}
